utility-token.name: Utility Token
utility-token.description: Tokens used for energy exchange and value inside HUMAS System.

extensions.description: HUMAScoin is the official token of the HUMAS System, designed to represent human energy in the digital economy. HUMAScoin is tied to the HUNIT energy standard and valued at 1 kWh, enabling people to convert effort into measurable, transferrable digital assets.
